name: Blooming Panic: Coffee With Quest
description:
You finally meet Quest face-to-face.

a fangame written by Eliana (@TheStorysinger, she/they) & coded by Norbez (@NaomiNorbez, he/they).

Music (from the original Blooming Panic) is "General Chat [Chilltalk]" by Faefield Productions, which you can listen to here.  Used with permission

Thank you to robobarbie to donating to our GoFundMe! <3

This is a non-profit fan project, not officially affiliated with Blooming Panic.  Play the original game here!
